title: Better.com CEO to Take Time Off After Zoom Firings
sub_head: Board hires outside firm to assess culture and leadership; finance chief to manage day-to-day decisions
body:
Vishal Garg, chief executive of online mortgage lender Better.com, is taking time off effective immediately, the company said, a week after a video of him laying off hundreds of workers on a Zoom conference call was posted online and viewed by millions.
Finance chief Kevin Ryan will manage day-to-day decisions, according to an email sent to employees Friday morning, which was reviewed by The Wall Street Journal. The email was signed by Better.comâ€™s board of directors and its chief compliance officer, Paula Tuffin.
